originalText.text:
My son had an appointment with the DOCTOR today. A CONSULTANT called him and basically told him what he needed. Told him he needed to try Rogaine and a package that would cost $13,000.
He NEVER spoke to a doctor and now he is super upset because he thought he was going to speak to a DOCTOR and schedule a procedure.
Also, I received several calls from consultants.

text.text:
My son had an appointment with the DOCTOR today. A CONSULTANT called him and basically told him what he needed. Told him he needed to try Rogaine and a package that would cost $13,000.
He NEVER spoke to a doctor and now he is super upset because he thought he was going to speak to a DOCTOR and schedule a procedure.
Also, I received several calls from consultants.

originalText.text:
My experience with Ziering Medical was absolutely superb from the consultation to the hands on post care. Jen, the team’s spectacular patient coordinator, helps facilitate the lead up to the procedure. Jen is incredibly kind, knowledgeable, and easy to talk to. I had some scheduling issues because of my job and Jen was extremely accommodating and understanding. Working with Jen makes the lead up to  operation day much more calm, relaxed, and informed and I cannot thank her enough.

On the day of the surgery, Dr. Ziering and Dr. Faucher performed my procedure together (you are not going to find many other clinics, if any, where two expert surgeons lead a procedure like this). Dr. Faucher removed the grafts from the donor area while Dr. Ziering made all of the recipient sites. Not only was their technical expertise beyond reproach, but the incredible bedside manner exhibited by both Dr. Faucher and Dr. Ziering was exceptional (the jokes just kept coming, and they were good!). The Doctors’ made me feel calm, always asked me to communicate if I was in pain, and made sure the procedure went seamlessly. Most of the procedure was spent watching Netflix and feeling nothing. Any time I was in pain, I brought it to the team’s attention, and the situation was immediately addressed. I cannot say enough about Dr. Ziering and Dr. Faucher, and my hairline looks fantastic! They really are the best of the best. It’s also worth noting, that Dr. Ziering was very straightforward in communicating what could be achieved and when, which is very much appreciated.

Last, but certainly not least, was the team of technicians working with Dr. Ziering and Dr. Faucher to harvest and place the grafts. They. Were. Incredible! Eyvett, Mary, Ami, and Ashely (If I missed anyone im sorry) were the best of the best, they made me feel safe and relaxed despite my anxiety. It truly felt like I was in the best of hands, and you could tell the technicians were extremely skilled and knowledgeable in what they were doing and had years upon years of experience. Their kindness, humor, and of course, their expertise, made the day go that much quicker and smoother.

Overall, Ziering Medical gave me a truly high class experience with unparalleled technical expertise (snacks, drinks, Netflix, and lunch during the procedure and more!) and I am very much looking forward to my full recovery (I am currently six days post op).

originalText.text: I first began to notice my receding hairline about a year ago. It freaked me out really badly. Dr. Faucher did an other-worldly job correcting it. No one can tell I had procedure and I look and feel 5 years younger. It really saved my life in some ways, I feel so much better now. I can’t share any pictures just yet because of my profession but take my word for it, if you want your hairline corrected come to Ziering. Cheers.

I can’t share any pictures just yet because of my profession but take my word for it, if you want your hairline corrected come to Ziering. Cheers.

originalText.text: Patti is the BEST! And the whole team at Ziering medical. They are very attentive to the whole process and give the best results. My hair has never looked better!

text.text: Patti is the BEST! And the whole team at Ziering medical. They are very attentive to the whole process and give the best results. My hair has never looked better!

originalText.text: I had this procedure done 4 months ago, I am already seeing results…I was very nervous at first, but I am pleased so far of how my hair growth is going…the staff made me feel very safe, and comfortable…everyone was very professional and there was nothing more that I could have asked for. All questions I had was answered effectively. I look forward to seeing my full hair growth once the 12 month period is up. This is the place to go. I highly recommend it to anyone  who is struggling with hair growth…thank you Ziering!
